Author: vxxrihye
Text: oh ok the water thing is probably a really good idea thank you :))

Author: smashing_hashing
Text: I have low blood pressure and get this occasionally. It gets worse during fasts of 24 hrs or more.   The best solutions for me:  - Stand up and stretch regularly  - Drink *at least* a gallon of water every day  - Lite salt is real and it can save you  - Lots of sleep/rest  - Do cardio, keep your cardiovascular systems in good working order to get the best performance
